mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_time, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NO) values(seq_board.nextval, current_date, #{pbvo.board_content}, #{user_no})
insert into file_list(user_no, board_no, file_image) values(#{user_no}, #{board_no}, #{file_image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RN, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TIME, BOARD_MODIFY, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_URL, a.USER_NO, BOARD_LIKE, BOARD_MODIFY_TIME, CNT, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_TIME, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_PROFILE, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER, USER_BOARD_OC, USER_SLEEP from( SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum AS rn, board_no, board_time, board_modify, board_content, board_url, user_no, board_like, board_modify_time, cnt from( SELECT bb.board_no, board_time, board_modify, board_content, board_url, bb.user_no, board_like, board_modify_time, bc.cnt FROM board bb LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT board.board_no, count(*) AS cnt FROM board, board_comment WHERE board.board_no = board_comment.board_no GROUP BY board.board_no ) bc ON(bb.board_no = bc.board_no ) ORDER BY board_time DESC ) ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum}-1)*5+1 AND #{pageNum}*5 ) a JOIN user_info b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) ) sq LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT follow_u_no AS board_follow FROM follow_list WHERE user_no = #{user_no} )f ON (sq.user_no = f.board_follow)
SELECT * FROM board WHERE board_content LIKE '%'||#{_parameter}||'%' ORDER BY board_time ASC
SELECT * FROM board WHERE user_no = #{_parameter} ORDER BY board_time DESC
SELECT file_image FROM ( SELECT board_no, file_image, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY board_no ORDER BY file_image) rnum FROM file_list WHERE user_no = #{_parameter} ) WHERE rnum = 1
SELECT user_no, user_id, user_profile FROM USER_INFO ui WHERE user_no IN ( SELECT follow_u_no FROM FOLLOW_LIST fl WHERE user_no = #{_parameter} )
